data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Goteborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Djurgarden's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for Goteborg in Stockholm.
Ball safe as Goteborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Djurgarden needs to be cautious. Goteborg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Djurgarden goal kick.
Goteborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Stockholm Goteborg's Christian Kouakou is caught offside.
In the minute 9, Djurgarden to take a throw-in in Goteborg territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Stockholm.
Throw-in for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 12, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Djurgarden throw-in in Goteborg's half.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Tele2 Arena.
Free kick for Djurgarden in the half of Goteborg.
In the minute 15, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Kalle Holmberg (Djurgarden) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Djurgarden awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Goteborg a goal kick.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Goteborg.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Djurgarden.
In Stockholm, Fredrik Ulvestad of Djurgarden is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Djurgarden have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 21, Play has been interrupted briefly in Stockholm to check on Jacob Une Larsson, who is grimacing with pain.
In Stockholm a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jacob Une Larsson is back on the pitch.
In the minute 23, Haris Radetinac for Djurgarden gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Goteborg a goal kick.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 24, Goteborg's Hosam Aiesh gets in a shot on goal at Tele2 Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Djurgarden goal kick.
In the minute 27, Alhassan Yusuf (Goteborg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kristoffer Karlsson blows against Djurgarden's Haris Radetinac for offside.
Djurgarden's Jacob Une Larsson misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Goteborg at Tele2 Arena.
Free kick for Djurgarden in their own half.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Djurgarden's Jesper Karlstrom breaks free at Tele2 Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Stockholm.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Penalty! Kristoffer Karlsson points to the spot, great chance for Goteborg...
In the minute 41, Jacob Une Larsson (Djurgarden) has received a first yellow card.
Tobias Sana converts the penalty to give Goteborg a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 43, Goteborg have a goal kick.
Free kick Djurgarden.
Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Djurgarden at Tele2 Arena.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Djurgarden have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Stockholm.
Thomas Lagerlof is making the team's second substitution at Tele2 Arena with Edward Chilufya replacing Kalle Holmberg.
Curtis Edwards is on a sub for Kevin Walker for Djurgarden.
Free kick for Goteborg in the half of Djurgarden.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Throw-in Djurgarden.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Djurgarden a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Goteborg at Tele2 Arena.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a throw-in for Djurgarden, close to Goteborg's area.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Tele2 Arena.
In the minute 51, Erik Berg (Djurgarden) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Tele2 Arena.
Haris Radetinac instrumental with a fine assist.
Goteborg are coming forward and Hosam Aiesh gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, Djurgarden have a goal kick.
Goteborg have a goal kick.
Jonathan Ring gets his shot on target but fails to score for Djurgarden.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Djurgarden.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Goteborg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 57, Goteborg's Alexander Jallow has been booked in Stockholm.
Can Djurgarden get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
In the minute 58, Pontus Wernbloom is replacing Christian Kouakou for the away team.
Curtis Edwards puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Free kick Djurgarden.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Djurgarden.
Djurgarden have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 65, Haris Radetinac for Djurgarden is back on the field again.
The match at Tele2 Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Haris Radetinac, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Free kick for Djurgarden in their own half.
In the minute 67, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Djurgarden in their own half.
Djurgarden have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Djurgarden awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Goteborg goal kick.
In Stockholm a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Tele2 Arena, Aslak Witry has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 73, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Goteborg close to the penalty box.
Tobias Sana for Goteborg drives towards goal at Tele2 Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 74, Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
The away team replace Victor Wernersson with Alexander Farnerud.
Goteborg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goteborg make their third substitution with Emil Holm replacing Jakob Johansson.
Djurgarden awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Nicklas Barkroth is replacing Jonathan Ring for Djurgarden at Tele2 Arena.
Edward Chilufya (Djurgarden) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 78, Djurgarden awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Djurgarden throw-in in Goteborg's half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 80, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Djurgarden.
Ball safe as Djurgarden is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Tele2 Arena.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the home team in Stockholm.
In Stockholm a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team have replaced Hosam Aiesh with Sargon Abraham. This is the fourth substitution made today by Poya Asbaghi.
In the minute 85, Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Alexander Farnerud scores with his head for Goteborg to level the match at 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick Goteborg.
Goteborg's Pontus Wernbloom gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Djurgarden have a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Stockholm.
Throw-in for Djurgarden at Tele2 Arena.
Throw-in for Djurgarden close to the penalty box.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Attention is being given to Goteborg’s Pontus Wernbloom and play has been suspended briefly.
